abstract.para: This procedure includes steps to install the base operating system and &kube; distribution for users who start deploying on cluster nodes from scratch. If you already have a &kube; cluster installed and running, you can skip this procedure and continue with .

step.para: Install and register &slm; 6.0 or later on each cluster node. Refer to for details.

Install the &nvidia; GPU driver on cluster nodes with GPUs. Refer to
for details.
Install &rke2; &kube; distribution on the cluster nodes. Refer to for details.
